scripts.postdeploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region <REGION> --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name <PROJECT_NAME> --s3-bucket <Bucket_name> --parameter-overrides PipelineBucket=<BUCKET_NAME> ProjectName=<PROJECT_NAME> BackendBucket=<BACKEND_BUCKET_NAME> Branch=<BRANCH> --profile=<USER>
